data.name: County Hospital 2 Demo
data.detailed_description:
MAMMA I NEED NEW PANTS!!


Paranormal Horror! Using just a handycam go inside a very dark abandoned hospital, the nightvision will help to see, explore the place to face all kinds of brutal entities and jumpscares, your mission is to find a fuse and return the power then destroy the place by setting it on fire PLAY THIS DEMO JUST THE FIRST LEVEL OF THE GAME FIND THE MISSING FUSE AND KEY


A long time ago, Kelia, paranormal detective, find the County Hospital, a site with a lot of paranormal activity... she managed to survive dark entities. Now she's back to investigate a new abandoned hospital that promises to give you the best jumpscares and a creepy enviroment, ideal for having fun with friends through streaming if you use twitch or youtube.

After finding the missing fuse and make power back on, open the gas valve on the third floor, because a spark of a broken electric box you will set the place on fire ...... try to escape alive before the fire take the place!!!


  • FIRST PERSON SINGLE PLAYER OFFLINE EXPERIENCE
  • Creepy and inmersive HORROR enviroment
  • TWO types of game: * Cam On Hand / * Inside Camera (recommended)
  • Very SCARY music and sound
  • LOT OF JUMPSCARES AND GHOSTS
  • Very high quality graphics made with Unreal Engine
  • GORE ENTITIES That will try to catch you
  • INTERACT WITH STUFF / FIND KEYS / OPEN DOORS / OPEN VALVES

We made indie games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 100 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
